price: And We send down from the sky blessed rain, with which We cause to grow gardens and grain for harvest,
arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
